Below is information on the latest government tender announcement pulled from the Government of Canada's contracting portal, Canada Buys.

# Tender Information

## Announcement Title
Tender for Aerological Observations at Inuvik Upper Air Station, Northwest Territories

## Solicitation Number
5000071860R

## Tender Closing Date
2024-01-02T17:00:00 (expired)

## Contract Period
The selected vendor is expected to fulfill the contract from March 1, 2024, to October 31, 2026, with an option to renew for three, one-year periods.

## Tender Details
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor to provide aerological observations at the Inuvik Upper Air Station, Northwest Territories. The contractor will be responsible for preparing the necessary instruments and conducting upper air soundings twice daily, collecting data and messages, and ensuring the prompt transmittal of the data onsite.

## Scope of Work
The contractor will perform the following tasks:

* Prepare and operate a comprehensive suite of atmospheric sounding instruments
* Conduct two soundings daily throughout the contract period
* Monitor and collect data and messages from the instruments
* Ensure data accuracy and transmittal to a centralized data management system

## Criteria for Selection
The lowest bid will not always win as the ECCC will evaluate responses based on both technical merit and price.

## Notice Documents
Please refer to the tender documents available on the Canada Buys website for further information regarding the solicitation:

- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27042/5000071860r-rfp-en_canadabuys_final.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27042/5000071860r-rfp-fr_canadabuys_final.pdf
